column5: I thought this deserved a thread of it's own. Chad has done an excellent job on capturing the Fish lift at Pratt's Pond. Over 180 photos and it was nice to browse through them. Thanks for taking the pictures for us Chad.   Cobourg Fish lift images   Cheers, Ron...

Thanks Ron!  Appreciate it, and I was more then happy to be there. I have loved fishing since as far back as I can remember and since I am 29 you think it would be easy lol.., and now I am merging my love of photography into it.  I feel its always good to photograph events such as this as it helps make people aware of how important it is to help keep our waters clean and free of pollution! And how one little event can have such a positive impact on preserving the fish numbers in the local waters so in years our grandkids can enjoy fishing the same waters!.
excuse my ignorance...what exactly are they doing there?
It does look like a lynching mob coming to town! lol  Forcing the trout up into the pool below the dam before pulling a barrier across to net them and lift over the dam.
